properties.description: Object with references to relevant element nodes
properties.name: _refs

properties.description: whether the input must match the given options or not
properties.name: mustmatch

properties.description: Sets the placeholder for the input
properties.name: placeholder

methods.description: Assigns some quick access to some node to avoid using same querySelectors all the time
methods.name: _setupScroll

methods.description: Adding a new option item programmaticaly
methods.name: addItem

methods.description: Checks if the user clicked outside the dropdown, if so it shrinks the dropdown
methods.name: customBlur

methods.description: Filters the items based on the user input
methods.name: filterResults

methods.description: Sets the item as the inputs value and hide the options div
methods.name: select

methods.description: Here we will setup the animations for the input
methods.name: setupAnimations

methods.description: Sets up the declarative user items for the combobox
methods.name: setupItems

methods.description: Creates some fast access elements so that theres no need for calling the QuerySelector all the time.
methods.name: setupRefs

methods.description: Here we setup our items depending on the store data
methods.name: setupStoreItems

methods.description: Sets up the listener to the click events
methods.name: setupTriggers

methods.description: Toggles the dropdown when clicking on the dropdown button
methods.name: toggleDropdown
